select.foreach: select #{item.startTime} AS startTime,#{item.endTime} AS endTime, IFNULL(aa.liveValidamount,0) liveValidamount, IFNULL(aa.sportValidamount,0) sportValidamount, IFNULL(aa.lottoValidamount,0) lottoValidamount, IFNULL(aa.jilvValidamount,0) jilvValidamount, IFNULL(aa.totalValidamount,0) totalValidamount,COUNT(*) from (select SUM(CASE WHEN type=1 then valid_amount else 0 END) as liveValidamount, SUM(CASE WHEN type=2 then valid_amount else 0 END) as sportValidamount, SUM(CASE WHEN type=3 THEN valid_amount else 0 END) as lottoValidamount, SUM(CASE WHEN type=4 or type=5 THEN valid_amount ELSE 0 END) as jilvValidamount, SUM(valid_amount) as totalValidamount from temp_audit_total WHERE username = #{param.username} AND site_id = #{param.siteId} AND bet_time >= #{item.startTime} AND bet_time < #{item.endTime} GROUP BY username) aa

mapper.select: SELECT username FROM ds_member WHERE site_id = #{param.siteId}

SELECT i.site_id AS siteId,IFNULL(tmp.betCount,0) AS betCount,i.site_name AS siteName,IFNULL(tmp.betamount,0) AS betamount, IFNULL(tmp.validamount,0) AS validamount, IFNULL(tmp.winlose,0) AS winlose, 0 AS gameKind, '总计' AS gameKindName FROM site_id_info i LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.site_id as siteId,SUM(a.bet_count) AS betCount,SUM(a.betamount) as betamount, SUM(a.validamount) as validamount,SUM(a.winlose) as winlose, 0 AS game_kind, '总计' AS game_kind_name FROM ds_report a WHERE a.bet_time >= #{param.betTimeBegin} AND a.bet_time <=#{param.betTimeEnd} GROUP BY a.site_id) tmp ON i.site_id = tmp.siteId
union all (SELECT i.site_id as siteId,SUM(a.bet_count) AS betCount,i.site_name as siteName,SUM(a.betamount) as betamount, SUM(a.validamount) as validamount,SUM(a.winlose) as winlose,a.game_kind as gameKind,a.game_kind_name as gameKindName FROM site_id_info i LEFT JOIN ds_report a ON i.site_id = a.site_id WHERE a.bet_time >= #{param.betTimeBegin} AND a.bet_time <=#{param.betTimeEnd} GROUP BY a.game_kind,i.site_id ORDER BY siteId)
select id,username,site_id,site_name,create_time,agents,world,corprator,superior,company from ds_member_log where id>#{id} limit 1000
SELECT count(1) FROM ds_member m where m.site_id = #{siteId}
